LanguageData.Bullet_SniperRifle.label: sniper rifle bullet
LanguageData.Gun_AssaultRifle.label: assault rifle
LanguageData.Gun_AssaultRifle.description: A general-purpose gas-operated assault rifle for field or urban combat. It has good range, decent power, and good accuracy.
LanguageData.Gun_AssaultRifle.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_AssaultRifle.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_AssaultRifle.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: assault rifle
LanguageData.Gun_Autopistol.label: autopistol
LanguageData.Gun_Autopistol.description: An ancient pattern blowback-operated self-loading pistol. It lacks stopping power and range, but is quick to fire.
LanguageData.Gun_Autopistol.tools.grip.label: grip
LanguageData.Gun_Autopistol.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_Autopistol.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: autopistol
LanguageData.Gun_BoltActionRifle.label: bolt-action rifle
LanguageData.Gun_BoltActionRifle.description: An ancient pattern bolt-action rifle. With its long range, and low fire rate, it is unlikely to drive animals to revenge, which makes it a favorite weapon for hunting.
LanguageData.Gun_BoltActionRifle.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_BoltActionRifle.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_ChainShotgun.label: chain shotgun
LanguageData.Gun_ChainShotgun.description: A magazine-fed fully automatic shotgun. It is even shorter-ranged than a typical shotgun, but is extraordinarily dangerous due to burst fire.
LanguageData.Gun_ChainShotgun.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_ChainShotgun.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_ChainShotgun.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: chain shotgun
LanguageData.Gun_EmpLauncher.label: EMP launcher
LanguageData.Gun_EmpLauncher.description: A wide-barreled EMP shell launcher. The shell will upon impact release a burst of electromagnetic energy, stunning mechanical targets (mechanoids, turrets, mortars) and depleting shields in the area of effect.
LanguageData.Gun_EmpLauncher.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_EmpLauncher.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_EmpLauncher.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: EMP launcher
LanguageData.Gun_HeavySMG.label: heavy SMG
LanguageData.Gun_HeavySMG.description: A compact, wide-caliber slug-thrower. It's got a very short range, but it packs a punch and handles quite well.
LanguageData.Gun_HeavySMG.tools.grip.label: grip
LanguageData.Gun_HeavySMG.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_HeavySMG.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: heavy SMG
LanguageData.Gun_IncendiaryLauncher.label: incendiary launcher
LanguageData.Gun_IncendiaryLauncher.description: A wide-barreled incendiary bolt launcher. The bolts create small incendiary explosions on impact, starting fires.
LanguageData.Gun_IncendiaryLauncher.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_LMG.label: LMG
LanguageData.Gun_LMG.description: A gas-operated light machine gun. While it is somewhat unwieldy and inaccurate, its long bursts of fire are effective against groups of enemies.
LanguageData.Gun_LMG.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_LMG.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_LMG.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: LMG
LanguageData.Gun_MachinePistol.label: machine pistol
LanguageData.Gun_MachinePistol.description: A micro-submachine gun. It is short-ranged, but very light in the hands. Its rate of fire tends to make up for its weakness.
LanguageData.Gun_MachinePistol.tools.grip.label: grip
LanguageData.Gun_MachinePistol.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_MachinePistol.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: machine pistol
LanguageData.Gun_Minigun.label: minigun
LanguageData.Gun_Minigun.description: A multi-barrel machine gun. It's unwieldy, but once it starts firing it fires very fast. Where most self-loading guns are powered by the energy from the gunpowder, the minigun uses an electric motor to rapidly cycle cartridges through the weapon.
LanguageData.Gun_Minigun.tools.barrels.label: barrels
LanguageData.Gun_Minigun.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: minigun
LanguageData.Gun_PumpShotgun.label: pump shotgun
LanguageData.Gun_PumpShotgun.description: An ancient design of shotgun that emits a tight-packed spray of pellets. Deadly, but short range.
LanguageData.Gun_PumpShotgun.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_PumpShotgun.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_PumpShotgun.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: pump shotgun
LanguageData.Gun_Revolver.label: revolver
LanguageData.Gun_Revolver.description: An ancient pattern double-action revolver. It's not very powerful, but has a decent range for a pistol and is quick on the draw.
LanguageData.Gun_Revolver.tools.grip.label: grip
LanguageData.Gun_Revolver.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_Revolver.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: revolver
LanguageData.Gun_SmokeLauncher.label: smoke launcher
LanguageData.Gun_SmokeLauncher.description: A wide-barreled smoke shell launcher. The shell will upon impact release a cloud of smoke, obscuring incoming shots and preventing turrets from locking on.
LanguageData.Gun_SmokeLauncher.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_SmokeLauncher.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_SmokeLauncher.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: smoke launcher
LanguageData.Gun_SniperRifle.label: sniper rifle
LanguageData.Gun_SniperRifle.description: An ancient design of precision sniper rifle. Bolt action. It has an exceptionally long range, great accuracy and good power. Because it's so unwieldy, other weapons outclass it at close range.
LanguageData.Gun_SniperRifle.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_SniperRifle.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_SniperRifle.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: sniper rifle
